name: Shenanigans Multiplayer X
description:
Child tested, mother approved! The successor to the wacky do-random-crap-with-your-friends mutltiplayer shootysandbox Shenanigans Multiplayer.
Ladies and gentlemen, meet Shenanigans Multiplayer X!

Shenanigans Multiplayer X improves on many downfalls of the original - better physics, better netcode, better graphics and better user interface.

Battle it out in the new Buildmatch gamemode!
In the buildmatch gamemode, players are given time to build bases. Once that time runs out, it's a battle for elimination. Is someone chickening and fortifying themselves? Don't worry, you'll still have a chance to take them on!

Fight with new weapons! Improved is the pitiful attempt at melee weapons made in Shenanigans Multiplayer 1, in SMP X melee weapons act like melee weapons! ROCKET LAUNCHERS!!! Blast your friends and foes like you've never done before.

Shenanigans Multiplayer X is still an early access beta, this means that some of the features from the original are still missing. There is no customization, no explosive barrels and no physics blocks. I hope to achieve feature parity soon.

WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR? IT'S FREE! and invite friends too :)
